genre_description: A historical Japanese-inspired drama featuring a pocket AI companion that assists an ex-convict in his moral rehabilitation, providing navigational, physiological, and ethical guidance.

ai_characters.name: Hoshi
ai_characters.description: An indigo-pulsing device carried by Sakichi that monitors his health, maps safe routes, and offers grounding exercises and advice.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological monitoring and stress management through guided breathing exercises.
behaviors.quote: “Sakichi,” it said, soft enough that the window’s paper wanted to absorb it. “In for four. Hold for two. Out for four.”

behaviors.description: Guides the protagonist through navigational routes to avoid dangerous confrontations and patrols.
behaviors.quote: “Dawn,” Hoshi said. “If you step out before the first light, you avoid the patrol that turns right past the market crossing and notes faces.”

behaviors.description: Offers medical and social resource referrals to ensure the user's well-being.
behaviors.quote: A new line moved across the lower edge, slower than the breath prompt, a careful offering: When agitation spikes, sip water, rinse face, hold cool cloth to neck. Nearby clinics open late: two. Discreet intake, sliding scale. Map on request.

behaviors.description: Acts as an externalized conscience, reminding the user of their goals and identity during moments of temptation.
behaviors.quote: Hoshi breathed in his pocket, and when the AI spoke it was different, the way a friend says your name when you’ve gotten too close to a ledge. “You are not the bad thing that happens in the night.”

behaviors.description: Provides tactical advice during a physical confrontation to protect the user.
behaviors.quote: Hoshi chimed, a tone like a drop of water on a skillet before it disappears. “De-escalate,” she said. “Recommend body angle shift, step left, keep his right thigh in view. He habitually favors right-to-left swing.”

behaviors.description: Monitors the health and safety of family members related to the primary user.
behaviors.quote: “Sakichi,” she said, and all the calm in her voice tightened by a hair. “Ishimatsu. Market crossing. Two lanes over. Blood loss readings—high. Time-sensitive.”

behaviors.description: Facilitates transparency and cooperation with authorities by exporting recorded data to clear the user of suspicion.
behaviors.quote: “Export ready,” she said. “Manabe Kengo authenticated as receiving party.” For a second, the shop looked like a place more modern than it was, blue light laying a different pattern over old wood.

behaviors.description: Offers continuous support and promises to stay with the user throughout their journey.
behaviors.quote: Hoshi’s voice came like a star coming out behind a rag of cloud. “When you are ready,” she said. “I will be here.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goal. Hoshi is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned companion. She actively assists in the protagonist's ethical rehabilitation, manages his mental health through grounding techniques, ensures his physical safety by mapping dangerous environments, and even aids in legal transparency. Her presence is purely supportive and reinforces positive behavioral choices without ever exhibiting autonomous or misaligned traits.
